content: **drops crochet basque hat and scarf with shell pattern in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the doce de coco hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **note** yardage includes enough for matching hat materials drops snow from garnstudio 300 g color no 01 off-white drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l/11 or size needed to obtain 9 treble_crochet us = width 10 cm 4 pattern links us version 2 uk version 3 french version 4 german version 5 finnish version 6 dutch version 7 norwegian version 8 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/109-49-a---doce-de-coco-hat 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=us 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=en 4 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=fr 5 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=de 6 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fi/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=fi 7 http //www garnstudio com/lang/nl/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=nl 8 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=49&lang=no
